item.title: Distributed Model Training
item.description: Neural network models are getting bigger and bigger. To keep up with this trend, it’s important to be able to scale the hardware that we use to train these models.

item.title: Fully Sharded Data Parallel
item.description: Fully Sharded Data Parallel (FSDP) is a distributed training algorithm that partitions both the dataset and model parameters across devices. FSDP can be classified as a data parallel algorithm since each device performs the computation on its local subset of the training data for each micro-batch
